original: intros. unfold ex_Rbar_div in H2. unfold ex_lim_seq in H0, H1. unfold Lim_seq in H3. unfold Rbar_div. rewrite H1 in H2. rewrite H0 in H2. rewrite H3 in H2. apply is_lim_seq_div'. apply Lim_seq_correct' in H0. apply Lim_seq_correct' in H1. apply is_lim_seq_div with (l1 := Lim_seq u) (l2 := Lim_seq v); auto.
